msg:
Version: 2.7, Visual enhancements! 
 If you are facing updating error! 
 1) Click YES and wait for download. 
 2) locate your app at Android/data/bd.ac.pust.pustvtsunofficial 
 3) Move app.apk to root directory. 
 4) Uninstall previous app. 
 5) Install app.apk! 
 6) Sorry for the inconviniance.
